doc.title: El hombre de la luna
doc.plot: Murder, Mysticism and Mystery The tale has all the ingredients of a classic suspense and more... A beautiful girl is found in the Valley of the Moon with her throat slashed, a homeless derelict is laying, passed out, besides her body. He'a accused of her murder. Case closed. Or is it? An expatriate lawyer is called on tho defend the accused and the cast of characters he encounters are a bizarre lot: a Ch'makani, or man of the dark, who can communicate with the dead' the dead girl's beautiful twin sister, an American exchange student, exiled by his parents to Bolivia for computer hacking, the lawyer's ex wife, and a mystery woman. They all combine for a steamy, exciting and suspense packed story
